alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Cleburne; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Fulton; Independence; Izard; Jackson; Lawrence; Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Randolph; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Sharp; Southeast Van Buren County; Stone; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 12 at 2:04PM CDT until March 13 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CDT MONDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning and Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 possible. * WHERE...Portions of eastern and north central Arkansas. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM CDT Monday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Monday night through Tuesday morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late Tuesday night through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
